title: mf: Mezzo Forte
sinopse:
A set of short stories, including:

1. A drunken game of cards leads to some unexpected results
2. Shouji is in love with Miwa-chan who is in love with Shuuhei. A love triangle of childhood friends.
   3-5. Introverted Ritsu and extroverted Souta both play saxophone in their school band. But Souta also plays jazz in some local clubs. One day he invites Ritsu to hear him play...
